title: Analyze/RE device through usb ports
content:
Hi, I disassembled my old smart TV and found the wifi card pretty interesting.
On the internet i found a minimal manaual datasheet...
It was simple to recognise that there is usb pins layout on there and I am trying to see what information I can get from only connecting it to my computer.

If I'm right and pins 1-4 are usb , I have a few questions:

Thanks in advance!

comments.text: If it's 3.3V, you would need a level shift (eg make 5V signal to 3V3 and 3V3 to 5V). Also, you don't know if the TV is usb host or usb slave. Maybe this port is for plugging other slave devices to?
